00054 JointTrajectoryController::JointTrajectoryController() {
00055   // Bouml preserved body begin 000EA0F1
00056     this->ISum = 0;
00057     this->DDiff = 0;
00058     this->PParameter = 20.0;
00059     this->IParameter = 10;
00060     this->DParameter = 50;
00061     this->last_pose_diff = 0;
00062     this->ISum_clipping = 1000;
00063     this->pose_diff_clipping = 65535;
00064     this->isControllerActive = false;
00065     this->controllerUpdatesPerSecond = 1000;
00066     this->targetPosition = 0;
00067     this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse = false;
00068     this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse = false;
00069   // Bouml preserved body end 000EA0F1
00070 }

00078   // Bouml preserved body begin 000ED671
00079   if(this->isControllerActive)
00080     throw JointParameterException("The trajectory controller is running");
00081   parameter.setParameter(this->PParameter);

00141 void JointTrajectoryController::setTrajectoryPositions(const std::list<int32>& targetPositions) {
00142   // Bouml preserved body begin 000EA1F1
00143 
00144     int buffer1size = 0;
00145     int buffer2size = 0;
00146     {
00147       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex1(trajectoryPositionsBuffer1Mutex);
00148       buffer1size = this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer1.size();
00149     }
00150     {
00151       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex2(trajectoryPositionsBuffer2Mutex);
00152       buffer2size = this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer1.size();
00153     }
00154 
00155     if (trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse == false && buffer1size == 0) {
00156       {
00157         boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex1(trajectoryPositionsBuffer1Mutex);
00158         this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer1 = targetPositions;
00159         this->isControllerActive = true;
00160       }
00161     } else if (trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse == false && buffer2size == 0) {
00162       {
00163         boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex2(trajectoryPositionsBuffer2Mutex);
00164         this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer2 = targetPositions;
00165         this->isControllerActive = true;
00166       }
00167 
00168     } else {
00169       LOG(error) << "Could not set the trajectory!";
00170     }
00171   // Bouml preserved body end 000EA1F1
00172 }

00174 void JointTrajectoryController::cancelCurrentTrajectory() {
00175   // Bouml preserved body begin 000F0771
00176    if (trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse == true) {
00177       {
00178         boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex1(trajectoryPositionsBuffer1Mutex);
00179         this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer1.clear();
00180 
00181       }
00182     } else if (trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse == true) {
00183       {
00184         boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex2(trajectoryPositionsBuffer2Mutex);
00185         this->trajectoryPositionsBuffer2.clear();
00186       }
00187 
00188     } else {
00189       LOG(error) << "Could not cancel the trajectory!";
00190     }
00191   // Bouml preserved body end 000F0771
00192 }

00200 bool JointTrajectoryController::updateTrajectoryController(const SlaveMessageInput& actual, SlaveMessageOutput& velocity) {
00201   // Bouml preserved body begin 000EA271
00202 
00203     {
00204       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex2(trajectoryPositionsBuffer1Mutex);
00205 
00206       if (!trajectoryPositionsBuffer1.empty() && !trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse && !trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse) {
00207         trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse = true;
00208       }
00209 
00210       if (!trajectoryPositionsBuffer1.empty() && trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse) {
00211         {
00212           boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex(targetPositionMutex);
00213           targetPosition = (trajectoryPositionsBuffer1).front();
00214         }
00215         (trajectoryPositionsBuffer1).pop_front();
00216       } else {
00217         trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse = false;
00218       }
00219     }
00220     {
00221       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex2(trajectoryPositionsBuffer2Mutex);
00222       if (!trajectoryPositionsBuffer2.empty() && !trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse && !trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse) {
00223         trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse = true;
00224       }
00225 
00226       if (!trajectoryPositionsBuffer2.empty() && trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse) {
00227         {
00228           boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex(targetPositionMutex);
00229           targetPosition = (trajectoryPositionsBuffer2).front();
00230         }
00231         (trajectoryPositionsBuffer2).pop_front();
00232       } else {
00233         trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse = false;
00234       }
00235     }
00236     
00237     
00238     if(!trajectoryPositionsBuffer1InUse && !trajectoryPositionsBuffer2InUse){
00239       this->isControllerActive = false;
00240       return false;
00241     }
00242       
00243    
00244   ///////////////////////// Controller
00245   
00246     int32 pose_diff;
00247     {
00248       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex(targetPositionMutex);
00249       pose_diff =  targetPosition - actual.actualPosition;
00250     }
00251 
00252     if(pose_diff > pose_diff_clipping)
00253       pose_diff = pose_diff_clipping;
00254     
00255     if(pose_diff < -pose_diff_clipping)
00256       pose_diff = -pose_diff_clipping;
00257     
00258 
00259     this->ISum = this->ISum + pose_diff;
00260     
00261     if(ISum > ISum_clipping)
00262       ISum = ISum_clipping;
00263     
00264     if(ISum < -ISum_clipping)
00265       ISum = -ISum_clipping;
00266       
00267       
00268     this->DDiff = this->last_pose_diff - pose_diff;
00269     velocity.value = ((this->PParameter/256.0) * pose_diff) + ((this->IParameter/65536.0)* this->ISum) + ((this->DParameter/256.0) * this->DDiff);
00270     this->last_pose_diff =  pose_diff;
00271     
00272     velocity.controllerMode = VELOCITY_CONTROL;
00273   //  printf("pose_target: %10d  pose_diff: %10d   velout: %10d\n",targetPosition, pose_diff, velocity.value);
00274     
00275     this->isControllerActive = true;
00276     return true;
00277   // Bouml preserved body end 000EA271
00278 }

00280 void JointTrajectoryController::getLastTargetPosition(JointEncoderSetpoint& position) {
00281   // Bouml preserved body begin 000EED71
00282   {
00283       boost::mutex::scoped_lock dataMutex(targetPositionMutex);
00284       position.encoderTicks = targetPosition;
00285   }
00286   // Bouml preserved body end 000EED71
00287 }
